intro: Hi, I’m Hakan Reşit. I’m a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences. Let’s shake hands with me.

project_1_description: A simple and customizable order form for users to order pizza.
project_2_description: A test file created for developers to test the accuracy of the information users enter on the 'Sign In' page.
project_3_description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.
lets_work: Let’s work together on your next product.
